resources.string: Test your knowledge and win the treats for Valentine\'s Day!
What kind of flowers are traditionally given to symbolize love?
Which was Shakespeare\'s most romantic play?
The \"Power of Love\" was a top 20 hit for which artist?
Where in NYC are Sam and Annie supposed to meet on Valentine\s Day?
Who is the first poet known to have written "Roses are red, violets are blue"?
In “Pretty Woman,” which of the following is a rule Julia Roberts’ character abides by??
Never see the same man twice.
Never answer the phone after 10 pm.
Who was the legendary Benedictine monk who invented champagne?
Oysters have long been considered an aphrodisiac. Why?
They are high in zinc, which is necessary for sperm production.
Shakespeare made a metaphor about them in The Merry Wives of Windsor.
They are said to look like the vagina.
They are rich in amino acids that trigger increased levels of sex hormones.
